alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:36AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alameda and central Contra Costa Counties through 1215 PM PST... At 1136 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alameda, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, San Leandro, Alameda, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, Danville, Martinez, Pleasant Hill, Lafayette, Castro Valley, Albany, Orinda, Moraga, Piedmont, Emeryville, Moraga Town and Alamo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys
